game.players

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.players.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer, NetworkPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class describing a player (AI, or network)

      • buildRoad

        public int buildRoad(Edge edge)
              throws CannotAffordException,
                     CannotBuildRoadException,
                     RoadExistsException
        Attempts to build a road for this player
        Parameters:
        edge - the edge to build the road on
        Returns:
        the length of the player's longest road
        Throws:
        CannotAffordException - if the player cannot afford it
        CannotBuildRoadException - if it is not a valid place to build a road
        RoadExistsException

      • loseResources

        public java.util.Map<ResourceType,java.lang.Integer> loseResources()
        Checks if a player has more than 7 resource cards. If so, cards are randomly removed until the player has 7 again.
